title: [1.13]求1.13所有附魔名称和翻译
author: 有毒○贰比
txt_content:
如题：求1.13所有附魔名称和翻译
命令用的

replies.author: aghinouz
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 aghinouz 于 2018-8-25 23:49 编辑 

详情请参考：https://minecraft-zh.gamepedia.c ... 0.E6.8D.AE.E5.80.BC

附魔名稱數字ID [僅基岩版]保护minecraft:protection0火焰保护minecraft:fire_protection1掉落保护minecraft:feather_falling2爆炸物保护minecraft:blast_protection3弹射物保护minecraft:projectile_protection4荆棘minecraft:thorns5水下呼吸minecraft:respiration6深海探索者minecraft:depth_strider7水中挖掘minecraft:aqua_affinity8锋利minecraft:sharpness9亡灵杀手minecraft:smite10节肢杀手minecraft:bane_of_arthropods11击退minecraft:knockback12火焰附加minecraft:fire_aspect13抢夺minecraft:looting14效率minecraft:efficiency15精准采集minecraft:silk_touch16耐久JE: minecraft:unbreaking
BE: minecraft:durability17时运minecraft:fortune18力量minecraft:power19击退minecraft:punch20火失minecraft:flame21无限minecraft:infinity22海之眷顾minecraft:luck_of_the_sea23钓饵minecraft:lure24水上行走minecraft:frost_walker25经验修补minecraft:mending26绑定诅咒[仅Java与基岩版[size=11.6667px]]minecraft:binding_curse27消失詛咒[仅Java与基岩版[size=11.6667px]]minecraft:vanishing_curse28穿刺[仅Java与基岩版[size=11.6667px]]minecraft:impaling29波涛[仅Java与基岩版[size=11.6667px]]minecraft:riptide30忠诚[仅Java与基岩版[size=11.6667px]]minecraft:loyalty31唤雷[仅Java与基岩版]minecraft:channeling32剑气[仅Javaminecraft:sweepingN/A摘自https://minecraft-zh.gamepedia.c ... 0.E6.8D.AE.E5.80.BC
希望能帮到你
